project.name: Engine
project.description: The Imixs Workflow engine is a full featured Workflow Management System (WFMS) based on the Java EE specification. The project extends the Imixs Workflow Core API project to fulfill the requirements to a scalable, transactional, robust and simple deployable JEE Workflow System. The Project provides different service components (EJBs) to be used in any kind of Java EE based business application.
